resources.string: Vehicle: You have a car that you wish to drive or employ others to drive
Vehicle: You wish to drive a motorcycle or scooter
Vehicle: You wish to drive a yellow plate motorcycle or scooter
Vehicle: You wish to drive an Auto Rickshaw

Make sure photo is not blurred and these details are clearly visible - Model, Vehicle number, Chasis number, Registration Name, Start Date, Expiry Date, Finacier name or Company name. You many need to submit additional photos if your document has multiple pages or sides or if first image was not clear.
Enter your Aadhaar and we’ll get your information from UIDAI. By sharing your Aadhaar details,you hereby confirm that you have shared such details voluntarily.
Enter your PAN Card number and we’ll get the required information from the NSDL, or you can upload your PAN card instead.
